name: Dominic Darnley
coverLetter: My name id Dominic i am 18 years old I just moved to humboldt county a few days ago from ohio i have minimal trimming experience from my own small grows back home but im eger to get into the cannabiss buisness. I can work full time or part time but i would preffer full time. I do not have an apartment yet so i can work just about anywhere moving is not a problem i do not need shelter or food as im currently staying at campgrounds. I have no criminal record i am honest and hard working i would also be interested in other jobs in the industy im not here just to trim for the season i moved to humbolt for the nature and when i found out about all the trimming jobs it was a huge bonus. You can reach me at dtk2617@gmail.com thanks for the opportunity:)
